dcterms:creator: Philipp Benz
Soomin Ham
Chaoning Zhang
Adil Karjauv
In So Kweon
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 classes, with 6,000 images per class, commonly used for evaluating machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: Philipp Benz
Soomin Ham
Chaoning Zhang
Adil Karjauv
In So Kweon
dcterms:description: A validation subset of the ImageNet dataset, used for evaluating the performance of models in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: ImageNet-Val

dcterms:creator: Philipp Benz
Soomin Ham
Chaoning Zhang
Adil Karjauv
In So Kweon
dcterms:description: A dataset containing corrupted versions of the ImageNet dataset, used to evaluate the robustness of models against common corruptions.
dcterms:title: ImageNet-C

dcterms:creator: Guillermo Ortiz-Jimenez
Apostolos Modas
Seyed-Mohsen Moosavi
Pascal Frossard
dcterms:description: Datasets created by applying low-pass filters to images, used to analyze the frequency information utilized by bio-inspired models.
dcterms:title: Low-pass filtered datasets

dcterms:creator: Klim Kireev
Maksym Andriushchenko
Nicolas Flammarion
dcterms:description: A collection of images with various common corruptions applied, used to evaluate the effectiveness of adversarial training against these corruptions.
dcterms:title: Common corruptions
